display.title: Advanced Assembler
description: The &&3Assembler&&r is a staple for every Tier; an important goal to unlock more recipes and progress further into the Age. Many in the community see crafting a voltage tier's Assembler as a sign of &&oproperly&&r reaching said voltage.
The &&bMV &&3Assembler&&r unlocks &&eTransistors&&r, &&eCapacitors&&r and &&eInductors&&r, used for the next tiers of Circuits.
